mapper.select: select t.id, t.p_id,t.name as title,(case when t.status = 2 then 'disabled' end) as type, (case when (select count(1) from sys_dept_type where p_id = t.id) > 0 then 'false' else 'true' end ) as isLeaf from sys_dept_type t where t.p_id = #{pId} order by t.order_no
select t.id,t.code,t.name,t.status,t.remarks,t.p_id,p.name as p_name from sys_dept_type t left join sys_dept_type p on p.id = t.p_id where t.id= #{id}
select role_id from sys_dept_type_role tr where tr.dept_type_id = #{id}

select t.id,t.name,t.order_no from sys_dept_type t where t.p_id = #{pId} order by t.order_no
limit #{str},#{length}
select t.id, t.p_id,t.name as title,(case when t.status = 2 then 'disabled' end) as type,t.code as data from sys_dept_type t where t.name like #{title} order by t.p_id,t.order_no
select ifnull(max(order_no), 0) from sys_dept_type t where t.p_id = #{pId}
select t.id,t.name as title,t.p_id,t.code as data from sys_dept_type t where t.status = #{status} order by t.order_no
select t.code as value,t.name as text from sys_dept_type t where t.p_id = (select p_id from sys_dept_type where code = #{code})
select count(1) from sys_dept_type sdt where sdt.p_id = (select id from sys_dept_type sdt2 where sdt2.code = #{code})
